title: Typhoon Warning Signal #2
message: Typhoon 'Pepito' is approaching Bicol Region. Expected landfall in 12-18 hours. Residents in low-lying areas are advised to evacuate immediately.

title: Flash Flood Advisory
message: Heavy rainfall may cause flash floods in river areas. Avoid crossing flooded roads and bridges.

title: Evacuation Center Update
message: Pio Duran Elementary School evacuation center is now fully operational with medical staff on standby.
